text: Monitor Setup “Home” page (what the tablet should be set to when you first start) 1. Click “GFX Scorpion” 2. Place your 3 default monitors into the position you would like them to be in a. VIP USER 1 – The GFX 4 Box b. PC F1 PCOIP – Trio c. PC F1 CORP – Inews PC 3. Navigate back to the “Home” page 4. Click “GFX Monitor and Audio” 5. Change any of the 4 inputs from the default (listed below) to what you need for the show a. GFX 01 (P1) b. GFX 02 (P2) c. PGM DIRTY d. SWR PVW This is how an idea of how your monitors should look once you are done these steps! TRIO Setup 1. If you set up your monitors and notice that your Trios are not currently logged in, click on connect on the screen that appears. 2. You should be auto logged-in at this point, and can jump to step 3, but if not then input the username and password a. Username: fro-cr31 / fro-cr32 (depending on the room) b. Password: Vprodedit! 3. Click on the Trio that you need for that monitor (I.E. FRO Trio) 4. Double click on the Trio icon in the middle of the desktop a. MSE-CR31-X = Control 31 MSE 1 b. MSE-CR31-Y = Control 31 MSE 2 c. MSE-CR32-X = Control 32 MSE 1 d. MSE-CR32-Y = Control 32 MSE 2 Speaker Setup Whatever you have placed into the 4 boxes of the VIP will become the first 4 routes for your “Speaker” page in the “GFX Monitors and Audio” section. These directly correspond to the input on your Wohler above your RTS panel. • If you change any of those 4 boxes at any time, the corresponding Wohler audio will follow and change as well Routing Cheat Sheet • GFX (Under #GLOBAL) o GFX 01 – P1 o GFX 02 – P2 o GFX 03 – A o GFX 04 – B o GFX 05 – C o GFX 06 – D o GFX 07 – E o GFX 08 – Footer o GFX 09 – Live Branding o GFX 10 – Record Branding o GFX 11 – UDB o GFX 20 – Backup Branding • REMS (Under #GLOBAL) o REM 171 – White House Camera o REM 172 – Cap Dome Camera o REM 020 – Network feed o REM 067 – Times Square Camera o REM 083 – White House Lawn Camera • CAMs o Cam Spy (This is the only cam under #GLOBAL) – Specified control room’s camera • AUX (Under #GLOBAL) o AUX 002 – NOC Return Aux for checking the squeezeback positioning o AUX 029 – UDB Input 1 (Route this with “GFX 11 IN 01”) o AUX 030 – UDB Input 2 (Route this with “GFX 11 IN 02”) • DDR (Under #GLOBAL) o DDR 02 – DDR used as the background for fullscreen graphics • VIP o VIP 01 – Fullscreens A-E/ Prompter o VIP 02 – Wall Monitoring o VIP 03 – Branding/Footer/Squeezeback/P1 • Walls (Under #GLOBAL) o RTR 3N SRC 002 – 3A East/South Wall o RTR 3N SRC 003 – 3A SW Wal/Tower RTS Cheat Sheet • 3G01 – 32 GPO Op • 3G03 – 31 GPO Op • 31F1 – 31 FRO Op • 32F1 – 32 FRO Op • 31F2 – 31 Banner Producer (Dayside Only) • 32F2 – 32 Banner Producer (Dayside Only) • 31M1 – 31 Graphics PA (Dayside Only) • 32M1 – 32 Graphics PA (Dayside Only) End of the Day 1. Exit the Trios back to the desktop 2. KVM out of the Trios (CTRL + Alt + F12) 3. Click to return to the “Home” screen
